Class BillController

java.lang.Object
PresentationLayer.BillController
public class BillController extends Object
Controller class for displaying bills in the BillView table Fetches all bills using BillDAO and shows them using reflection

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BillController(BillView view)
    Constructs the controller and loads the bills
